# Telerik.Web.UI.TreeListAutoGeneratedColumnCreatedEventArgs

The arguments passed when Telerik.Web.UI.RadTreeList fires the AutoGeneratedColumnCreated event.

* System.Object
* System.EventArgs
* Telerik.Web.UI.TreeListAutoGeneratedColumnCreatedEventArgs
